Style studio prototypes!

Style shuffle Concept: Using the experience we currently have for Style Shuffle to bring packs of senses for clients to rate.
LOE: tbc Scale Concept: Asking clients to place themselves on a scale for each sense.
LOE: tbc

Old shizzle!

Style senses on home Concept: Using exisiting modules to create a more personalized AND varied client experience on home, so that clients feel like SFIX understands trends and fashion, how to apply it to their personal style, and with the ability to course-correct. Freestyle reorg Concept: Create a Freestyle experience that is easy and intriguing for clients to navigate, that align with trends and merch calendar, with streamlined actions across sections, that ties fix and freestyle together in a way that creates client value. Feedback? Ideas? Ping @torunn on slack!
